overview:
Sagi Ittah joined the Taboola User Experience Team in 2007 and concentrates on Flash and user experience development. Before joining Taboola, Sagi was the flash developer for NRG.co.il, the website of one of Israel’s leading daily newspapers.

Sagi has been freelancing and working with professional studios as a web and Flash developer since 2004. He has completed several professional web development courses and is fluent in numerous programming languages. Sagi joined the Taboola team to contribute his professional expertise in Flash applications and user experience development.
